TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInputChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
type IInputChannel = interface interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定义通道为接收消息而必须实现的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface that a channel must implement to receive a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协定包含接收、试图接收和等待消息功能的同步和异步版本。The contract includes synchronous and asynchronous variants of receive, try-to-receive and wait-for-a-message functionality. 提取模式通常与 一起用于接收消息：调用 （从通道“提取”消息），然后等待消息到达。The pull model is used typically with an to receive messages: you call (to "pull" a message out of the channel) and then wait for a message to arrive. 另一种用法模式是调用 或 ，然后调用 。An alternative usage pattern is to call or , and then call . 这种方法常见于事务性用法中，其中您在对 和 的调用之间启动事务。This approach is common for transactional usages where you start the transaction between the calls to and . 不一定绑定到单个发送方。An is not necessarily bound to a single sender. 其他通道和通道接口可以提供特定发送方和 之间的关联，但基协定没有这样的限制。Other channels and channel interfaces can provide a correlation between particular senders and an , but the base contract makes no such restriction. 实现可以为每个消息创建新的 ，或为多个消息和发送方重用同一个 。An implementation can create a new for each message or reuse the same for multiple messages and senders.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous receive operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待接收请求，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when you want the application processing to continue without waiting for the request to be received. 如果当前线程在收到请求消息或超出 指定的时间间隔之前可以被阻塞，则使用同步 `timeout` 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked until the request message is received or the interval of time specified by the `timeout` has been exceeded. 在有无显式超时的情况下，异步操作都可用。The asynchronous operation is available with or without an explicit timeout.

summary.span: 开始用于接收消息的异步操作，该操作具有关联的状态对象。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to receive a message that has a state object associated with it.
The that references the asynchronous message reception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待接收请求，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when you want the application processing to continue without waiting for the request to be received. 如果当前线程在收到请求消息或超出 指定的时间间隔之前可以被阻塞，则使用同步 `timeout` 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked until the request message is received or the interval of time specified by the `timeout` has been exceeded. 在有无显式超时的情况下，异步操作都可用。The asynchronous operation is available with or without an explicit timeout. 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到通道中出现消息时，才完成此操作。The operation is not complete until a message becomes available in the channel. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingduplexchannel.cs#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待接收请求，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when you want the application processing to continue without waiting for the request to be received. 如果当前线程在收到请求消息或超出 指定的时间间隔之前可以被阻塞，则使用同步 `timeout` 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked until the request message is received or the interval of time specified by the `timeout` has been exceeded. 在有无显式超时的情况下，异步操作都可用。The asynchronous operation is available with or without an explicit timeout. 直到通道中出现消息时或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the channel or the time out occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingduplexchannel.cs#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when you want the application processing to continue without waiting. 如果当前线程在回复请求消息时可以被阻塞，或者一直被阻塞到超出超时间隔，则使用同步 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message or until the timeout interval is exceeded. 直到通道中出现消息时或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the channel or the timeout occurs. 如果您打算处理超时而不仅仅是重新引发或包装 ，则应该调用 而不是 。If you are going to handle timeouts and not just re-throw or wrap the , then you should call instead of . 如果您不打算专门处理超时，则仅调用 ，否则将丢失错误信息。If you are not going to treat timeouts specially then just call , otherwise you lose error information. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingduplexchannel.cs#19)]

exception.span: 在操作完成前超出指定的 。

span.span: The specified is exceeded before the operation is completed.
The timeout specified is less than zero.

span.para: 该操作返回从如果指定超出。
The operation returns from if the specified is exceeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待消息到达，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method if you need the application processing to continue without waiting for the message to arrive. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用同步 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 该线程最多被阻塞 `timeout` 指定的时间长度。The thread is blocked up to the specified `timeout`. 此方法通过回调为操作接收事件处理程序标识的通知。This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation. 直到通道中出现消息时或发生超时时才完成操作。The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the channel or the time out occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingduplexchannel.cs#22)]

Public ReadOnly Property LocalAddress As EndpointAddress

summary.span: 获取输入通道接收消息的地址。

span.span: Gets the address on which the input channel receives messages.
The on which the input channel receives messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果输入通道没有独立地址（例如，它是客户端启动的 TCP 通道的输入方），则此属性为 `null`。If this input channel does not have a standalone address (for example, it is the input-side of a client-initiated TCP channel), then this property is `null`. 为了实现关联，此属性可由更高层的通道使用。This property can be used by higher-level channels for correlation purposes. 例如，如果更高层通道在 之上实现请求-回复，它可以在 WS-Addressing ReplyTo 标头中使用 。For example, if a higher-level channel implements request-reply on top of a , it can use the property in the WS-Addressing ReplyTo header. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此属性：The following code illustrates how to implement this property: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingduplexchannel.cs#12)]

exception.span: 该操作未在超时时间间隔内完成。

span.span: The operation did not complete with the timeout interval.
The input channel failed.
The input channel has been aborted.
The input channel faulted.

summary.span: 如果在显式或隐式定义的时间间隔内有可用的消息，则返回输入通道接收的消息。

span.span: Returns a message received by the input channel, if one is available with an interval of time that is explicitly or implicitly defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前线程在收到请求消息或超出 指定的时间间隔之前可以被阻塞，则使用同步 `timeout` 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked until it receives the request message or exceeds the interval of time specified by `timeout`. 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待接收请求，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when you need the application processing to continue without waiting for the request to be received. 在有无显式超时的情况下，同步 操作都可用。The synchronous operation is available with or without an explicit timeout. 如果没有可用的消息，此方法将发生阻塞，直到有可用消息或超时为止。If a message is not available, it blocks until one is available or until the timeout is exceeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前线程在收到请求消息或超出 指定的时间间隔之前可以被阻塞，则使用同步 `timeout` 方法。Use the synchronous method when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked until it receives the request message or exceeds the interval of time specified by `timeout`. 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待接收请求，则使用异步 方法。Use the asynchronous method when you want the application processing to continue without waiting for the request to be received. 在有无显式超时的情况下，同步 操作都可用。The synchronous operation is available with or without an explicit timeout. 如果没有可用的消息，此方法将发生阻塞，直到有可用消息或超时为止。If a message is not available, it blocks until one is available or until the timeout is exceeded. 可以被多次调用或并发调用。 can be called multiple times or concurrently. 对于每个接收的消息，只有一次 调用可以完成。Only one call can complete for each message received. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingduplexchannel.cs#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 不会导致以任何其他方式接收或处理消息。Calling does not result in a message being received or processed in any other way. 方法主要用于用户要使用事务接收消息的事务处理方案。The method exists primarily for transacted scenarios where the user wants to receive the message using a transaction. 在通常只需要为此使用 时，用户必须创建事务，然后调用 并希望消息在事务超时前到达，但这可能不可行。When using just normally for this, the user must create the transaction and then call and hope the message arrives before the transaction times out, which may not be possible. 用户可以改为调用 并指定所需的任何超时值（甚至是无限超时值），接着在消息到达时，可以打开事务，调用 并确信它们能在事务过期前取回消息。Instead, the user can call with whatever time out they want (even infinite), then when a message arrives they can open the transaction, call and be confident that they can get the message back before the transaction expires. 此方法是同步的，因此在有可用消息或发生超时之前，它一直阻塞当前线程。This method is synchronous, so it blocks the current thread until a message is available or the time out occurs. 如果当前线程在等待消息到达队列时可以被阻塞，则使用 。Use when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it waits for a message to arrive in the queue. 该线程最多被阻塞 `timeout` 指定的时间长度。The thread is blocked up to the specified `timeout`. 如果需要应用程序处理继续进行而不等待，则使用异步 方法。If you need the application processing to continue without waiting, use the asynchronous method. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingduplexchannel.cs#21)]

exception.span: 在操作完成前超出指定的 。

span.span: The specified is exceeded before the operation is completed.
The timeout specified is less than zero.

span.para: 该操作返回如果指定超出，则不超时异常。
The operation returns if the specified is exceeded, not a timeout exception.
